entry.content:
best Valentine’s Day 2014 Love Wallpapers HD Love is You

best Valentine’s Day 2014 Love Wallpapers HD Love is You

Even if trees lose their greenery,
or rose their smell,
but let ur smile stay all through out ur life
no matter what happens!
Happy Rose Day>>>>>>>


Tere aane se zindagi kitni khubsurat hogi h,
Dil me basi h jo surat wo teri hi surat h,
Door na jaye mere se kadhi bhi bhulkar,
Main ne har kadam par teri hi zarurat h.
Happy Valentine’s Day..
